Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T1.OCORHIST, T1.OPERACAO, T1.SITCONTB, T1.COD_PRODUTO, T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO, T2.IND_TIPO_FUNCAO, T1.CODPSVI, T1.NUMREC, T3.CGCCPF, T3.CLIFOR, T3.DCOIRF, T3.DCOINSS, T3.DCOISS, T3.CEP, T3.CIDADE, T3.NOME, T3.TPPESSOA FROM seguros.v0histsini T1, seguros.v0histsini T2, seguros.v0histsini T3 WHERE T1.OPERACAO = T2.COD_OPERACAO AND T2.IDE_SISTEMA = 'SI' AND T3.CLIFOR = :CLIFOR AND T3.TIPREG = '4' AND T3.CLIFOR = T1.CODPSVI AND T3.CODSVI_ISS = T1.CODSVI AND T1.SITCONTB IN ('1','2') AND T1.DTMOVTO >= :SI9GW01.DATA-INICIAL AND T1.DTMOVTO <= :SI9GW01.DATA-FINAL AND T2.IND_TIPO_FUNCAO IN ('IN','DE','HO','DS','HS','RSHOP','RSREP') AND T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO IN ('IND','DPAG','HPAG','DSPAG','HSPAG','RESSA-HON','RESSA-REP') ORDER BY T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T1.OCORHIST, T1.OPERACAO END SQL
